sentence.Network_en: We ate at a faddish new restaurant.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在一家新开张的时尚餐馆吃饭。

sentence.Network_cn: 拨号上网一说, 从那时起开始风行.

sentence.Network_en: There was , to be sure, a faddish aspect to this enthusiasm.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这个热潮中, 肯定有赶时髦的成分.

list.abs: Obsessive , especially faddish , devotion to or veneration for a person , principle , or thing ., 狂热崇拜对某一人 , 原则或事物的过分的 , 尤指趋附时尚的奉献或敬奉.
that's just how Qiao furnished his own faddish art studio , with each piece of his furniture costing below 20 yuan on average .乔小刀就是这样装饰自己的时尚艺术工作室的，每件家具平均花费不到20元。
There was , to be sure , a faddish aspect to this enthusiasm ., 在这个热潮中 , 肯定有赶时髦的成分.

entry.tran: 风靡一时的;流行一时的
entry.def: If you describe something as faddish, you mean that it has no real value and that it will not remain popular for very long.

means.word_mean: 1. intensely fashionable for a short time

auth_sentence.content: The bags are heirlooms, offering an appeal beyond faddish trends.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"像……一样,有……的",通常放在具体的名词后; 2. 表动词,"造成……,成……"

stems_affixes.word_buile: slug懒汉+ish像……一样,有……的→sluggish→行动迟钝的,缓慢的
book书+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.书呆子的
boor粗野的人,不懂礼貌的人+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.粗野的

fadd时尚+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.流行一时的,时尚的
fat非,胖+ish像……一样,有……的→fattish略胖的
fiend魔鬼+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.极凶恶的

self自己+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.自私的

di分开+mini小+ish造成……,成……→变小,减少
em进入+bell美好+ish造成……,成……→进入美好→装饰
fam饿+ish造成……,成……→v.使饥饿
